content.question: In Édouard Manet’s Olympia, the influence of Titian’s Venus of Urbino on the work is most evident in the

choices.label: reclining pose of the nude female figure
flat painting style and stark highlights
unidealized depiction of an actual person

content.answer: reclining pose of the nude female figure

topic.text: 4.1: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Later European and American Art

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Explain the influence of a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) on other artistic production within or across cultures.
